name: PM-KISAN Samman Nidhi
description: Income support to all landholding farmer families in the country.
eligibility_rules: Small and marginal farmers owning cultivable land. Excludes income tax payers and institutional land holders.
benefit: Rs. 6,000 per year in three equal instalments directly to bank account.
steps: Collect Aadhaar, bank details and land records.
Apply at local agriculture office or online PM-KISAN portal.
Track application status via portal or helpline.

name: Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana
description: Provides LPG connections to women from poor households.
eligibility_rules: Woman from BPL household without LPG connection in her household.
benefit: Free LPG connection with financial assistance for first refill and stove.
steps: Visit nearest LPG distributor with required documents.

name: Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana
description: National mission for financial inclusion through zero balance bank accounts.
eligibility_rules: Indian citizens above 10 years without a bank account.
documents_required: Aadhaar card or other ID proof
benefit: Zero balance account, RuPay card, accident insurance, overdraft facility.
steps: Visit nearest bank branch or CSP.
Submit KYC documents and complete biometrics if required.
